attributes.action: Increase the minium wage to £10.00 per hour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am creating a petition for the low incomes and for minium wages of the hard working men and women of this country should be raised to £10.00 per hour.If inflation goes up so should low income and the minium wage should go up for the working public been able to afford to live.
